nodes.text: Outpost Thorazan was a Galactic Republic outpost in the Dune Sea region of Tatooine during the Cold War with the Sith Empire.

Outpost Thorazan was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It appears as one of the Republic settlements on the planet Tatooine.
